001package game;
002import java.util.Stack;
003
004/**
005 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
006 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
007 * 
008 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
009 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
010 *  the parser returns.
011 * 
012 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
013 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
014 */
015public class GameEngine
016{
017    private Parser        aParser;
018    private Room          aCurrentRoom;
019    private Stack<Room> aPreviouRooms;
020    //private LinkedList<Room> aLastRooms;
021    private UserInterface aGui;
022
023    /**
024     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
025     */
026    public GameEngine()
027    {
028        this.aParser = new Parser();
029        this.createRooms();
030        this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * Sets the GUI
035     * @param pUserInterface User Interface 
036     */
037    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
038    {
039        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
040        this.printWelcome();
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * Print out the opening message for the player.
045     */
046    private void printWelcome()
047    {
048        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
049        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to game of The return of Yamata no Orochi !" );
050        this.aGui.println( "The monster came back to life and Tetsuma must create a katana to save Japan !." );
051        this.aGui.println("From now, you have to help him find materials to let him create the weapon !");
052        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
053        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
054        this.aGui.println( this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription() );
055        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null )
056            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
057    }
058
059   /**
060     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
061     */
062    private void createRooms(){
063        Room vShirago = new Room("in your village of birth, Shirakawa-go.","./Images/shirakawa.jpg");
064        Room vGujoHachi = new Room("In the Gujô Hachiman castle.","./Images/gujohachi.jpg");
065        Room vOsaka = new Room("in the Osaka city.","./Images/Osaka.jpg");
066        Room vTsushi = new Room("in the Tsushima island.","./Images/Tsushima.jpg");
067        Room vSeki = new Room("in the Seki blacksmiths village, it's the end of your odyssey.","./Images/seki.jpg");
068        Room vNara = new Room("in the Nara city known for its deers.","./Images/Nara_fire.jpg");
069        Room vGinkaku = new Room("in the Ginkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Ginkakuji_fall_2.jpg");
070        Room vKinkaku = new Room("in the Kinkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Kinkaku.jpg");
071        Room vYoshino = new Room("in the Yoshino national park, the forest is big here.","./Images/Yoshino_park.jpg");
072        Room vNagoya  = new Room("in the Nagoya city","./Images/Nagoya.jpg");
073        Room vMtFuji = new Room("at the foot of the Mt Fuji.","./Images/MtFuji.jpg");
074        Room vTokyo = new Room("in the Tokyo tower, the biggest tower of Japan.","./Images/tokyo_tower.jpg");
075        Room vSapporo = new Room("in the Sapporo city, in the north of Japan.","./Images/sapporo_snow.jpg");
076        Room vAogashi = new Room("in the island of Aogashima, in the middle of the ocean.","./Images/Aogashima.jpg");
077        
078        
079        this.aCurrentRoom = vShirago;  // la partie commence a Shirakawa-go
080        vShirago.setExit("south", vGujoHachi);
081        vShirago.addItem("Mochi", new Item("A sweety mochi", 1));
082
083        // GujoHachi : up -> MtFuji, west -> Osaka
084        vGujoHachi.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
085        vGujoHachi.setExit("west", vOsaka);
086
087        // Osaka : north -> Ginkaku, east -> GujoHachi, south -> Nara, west -> Tsushi
088        vOsaka.setExit("north", vGinkaku);
089        vOsaka.setExit("east", vGujoHachi);
090        vOsaka.setExit("south", vNara);
091        vOsaka.setExit("west", vTsushi);
092
093        // Ginkaku : east -> Kinkaku, south -> Osaka
094        vGinkaku.setExit("east", vKinkaku);
095        vGinkaku.setExit("south", vOsaka);
096        vGinkaku.addItem("Silver Shigane", new Item("A silver metal used for blade crafting", 3));
097
098        // Kinkaku : south -> Ginkaku
099        vKinkaku.setExit("south", vGinkaku);
100        vKinkaku.addItem("Gold Tamagane", new Item("A golden metal used for blade crafting", 3));
101
102        // Tsushi : north -> Osaka, east -> Seki
103        vTsushi.setExit("north", vOsaka);
104        vTsushi.setExit("east", vSeki);
105        vTsushi.addItem("Volcanic stone", new Item("A stone impregnated by the sea god's energy", 2));
106
107        // Seki : west -> Tsushi
108        vSeki.setExit("west", vTsushi);
109
110        // Nara : east -> Yoshino
111        vNara.setExit("east", vYoshino);
112        vNara.addItem("Horn of the goddess", new Item("A horn given by the goddess of deers", 2));
113
114        // Yoshino : east -> Nagoya
115        vYoshino.setExit("east", vNagoya);
116        vYoshino.addItem("Bamboo of holy forest", new Item("A rare type of bamboo which only exists here", 2));
117
118        // Nagoya : up -> MtFuji, west -> Yoshino
119        vNagoya.setExit("west", vYoshino);
120        vNagoya.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
121
122        // MtFuji : north -> Sapporo, east -> Tokyo, south -> Nagoya, west -> GujoHachi
123        vMtFuji.setExit("down-north", vSapporo);
124        vMtFuji.setExit("down-east", vTokyo);
125        vMtFuji.setExit("down-south", vNagoya);
126        vMtFuji.setExit("down-west", vGujoHachi);
127
128        // Tokyo : west -> Nagoya
129        vTokyo.setExit("west", vNagoya);
130
131        // Sapporo : south -> Aogashi
132        vSapporo.setExit("south", vAogashi);
133        vSapporo.addItem("Ice'dragon's amulet",new Item("An amulet which freezes monsters and yokais", 5));
134
135
136        // Aogashi : north -> Sapporo, south -> Tokyo
137        vAogashi.setExit("north", vSapporo);
138        vAogashi.setExit("south", vTokyo);
139        vAogashi.addItem("Aogashima's salt", new Item("Holy salt used for purifying monsters", 1));
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Print a sentence.
144     */
145    private void eat(){
146        this.aGui.println("You have eaten now and you are not hungry any more.");
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Print out the description of the current room.
151     */
152    private void look(){
153        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription()); 
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Go back to the previous room
158     */
159    private void back(){
160        if(this.aPreviouRooms.empty()){
161            this.aGui.println("You can't go back anymore !");
162            return;
163        }
164        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aPreviouRooms.pop();
165        this.aGui.println( this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription() );
166        if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null )
167            this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Process the command. Return true if the command ends the game, false otherwise.
172     * @param pCmdLine The command to process.
173     */
174    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmdLine) {
175        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmdLine);
176        Command pCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmdLine );
177        if (pCmd.isUnknown()) {
178            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
179            return;
180        }
181        String vCommandWord = pCmd.getCommandWord();
182        if ("help".equals(vCommandWord)) {
183            this.printHelp();
184        } else if ("go".equals(vCommandWord)) {
185            this.goRooms(pCmd);
186        } else if ("quit".equals(vCommandWord)) {
187            if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
188                this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
189            } else {
190                this.endGame();
191            }
192
193        } else if("look".equals(vCommandWord)){
194            this.look();
195        
196        } else if ("eat".equals(vCommandWord)){
197            this.eat();
198        } else if ("back".equals(vCommandWord)){
199            this.back();
200        } 
201        else {
202            System.out.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
203            return;
204        }
205    }
206
207    // implementations of user commands:
208
209   /**
210     * Print out some help information.
211     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.
212     */
213    public void printHelp(){
214        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\r\n" + //
215                        "You wander around Japan.\r\n" + //
216                        "\r\n" + //
217                        "Your command words are:\r\n" +  this.aParser.showCommands() //
218                        );
219       
220    }
221    /**
222     * Go to the room in the given direction. If there is no room in that
223     * direction, print an error message.
224     * @param pCmd the command to process (should contain "go" and a direction).
225     */
226    private void goRooms(Command pCmd){
227        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
228            System.out.println("Go where ?");
229            return;
230        };
231        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
232        Room vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(vDirection);
233        if(vNextRoom == null){
234            this.aGui.println("There's no door");
235        } else {
236            this.aPreviouRooms.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
237            this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
238            this.aGui.println( this.aCurrentRoom.getLongDescription() );
239            if ( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() != null )
240                this.aGui.showImage( this.aCurrentRoom.getImageName() );
241            else{
242                System.out.println("Image non trouvée");
243            }
244        }
245    }
246
247
248    /**
249     * End the game
250     */
251    public void endGame(){
252        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
253        this.aGui.enable( false );
254    }
255
256}
257
